name: Cloudraker
abilities: Can choose to end a transition burn in low orbit of an asset, but takes damage equal to the mass factor of the orbital.

name: Soilrazer
abilities: When bombarding an asset, you may choose a megastructure on the asset to receive one damage. This damage cannot be reduced in any way.

name: Olyphant Support Ship
abilities: Spacecraft in the same orbital as this card may take one less damage when receiving damage from any source.

name: Itano's Cloud
abilities: When this spacecraft makes an attack, choose a spacecraft in orbit around the asset. That spacecraft must spend 2 delta-vee or receive 1 damage.

name: Cheetah Fleet Carrier
abilities: When this spacecraft moves, one other spacecraft in the same orbit may move with it.

name: Javelin Short-Range Defender
abilities: Javelin may attack an enemy ship in any orbital. Javelin may not be activated to move from the asset it was constructed on.

name: Mobile Construction Yard
abilities: You may activate this spacecraft to add 1 construction to a megastructure or spacecraft under construction at the orbited asset. You may do this only once per turn.

name: Pathmaker
abilities: When this spacecraft damages another spacecraft, it may regain 1 delta-vee.

name: Herald of Destruction
abilities: When this spacecraft orbits an asset for the first time all enemy spacecraft must spend one delta-vee or take one damage.

name: Steel Bathtub
abilities: This spacecraft does not take damage from debris.

name: Scout Vessel
abilities: Activate: Look at one facedown card on the currently orbited asset.

name: Nanoswarm Reaper
abilities: When Nanoswarm Reaper damages an asset, that asset cannot be activated for the rest of the round.

name: Nanoswarm Regenerator
abilities: Activate: Nanoswarm Keeper takes one damage, a spacecraft in the same orbital gains one armor. This armor disappears at the end of the round.

name: Nanoswarm Sower
abilities: Spacecraft damaged by Nanoswarm Sower cannot use the repair action for the rest of this round.

name: GX7 Mirrorbomb
abilities: Activate: Swap control of GX7 Mirrorbomb and target enemy spacecraft in orbit around the same asset until the end of the round. Use this ability only once each round.

name: T9000 CH4F
abilities: Spacecraft attacking T9000 CH4F are treated as having 1 accuracy.

name: Immolation Beam
abilities: When Immolation Beam attacks you may subtract 3 from one dice rolled to attack.

name: Organic Dissolver
abilities: When Organic Dissolver moves do one damage to all spacecraft in the starting and ending orbital.

name: SW4RM RP9
abilities: Activate: Activate a friendly ship in orbit around this asset without paying activation costs.

name: Retroactive Postconstructor
abilities: Activate: Remove a piece of debris from the same orbit as Retroactive Postconstructor. Draw a card.

name: Needle Ship
abilities: When Needle Ship moves do 1 damage to target spacecraft in the ending orbital unless that spacecraft pays 2 delta-vee.

name: Assimilation Architect
abilities: Activate: If there is debris in this orbital, remove it and add 1 construction to a spacecraft or megastructure under construction at the same asset.

name: HEAT S33K3R
abilities: When HEAT S33K3R bombards an asset, use the full value of bombardment instead of the half value.

name: Prototype Displacer
abilities: Activate: Take 3 damage. Move Prototype Displacer to any orbit around any asset.

name: Superluminal Node
abilities: Spacecraft in the same orbit as X cost 1 less command to activate. This cannot lower the value below 1.
